{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Compex |model=HK01 |revision=(IPQ8074) |series=AX6000 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |availability=now |est_release_date=07/2018 |pcb_id=YC496AP.HK01 |type=wireless embedded board |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ8074 |cpu1_cspeed=2.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 MiB |fla1_brand=Micron |fla1_model=MT29F2G16ABBEAH4:E |fla2=32 MiB |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L25635F |fla3=8 GiB |fla3_brand=Micron |fla3_model=eMMC |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Micron |ram1_model=MT41K256M16TW-107 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 3.0, SFP+ |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sfp_num=1 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, |serial=yes,, 12-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=QCN5054 |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=QCN5054 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac+ax |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=8 |wi1_rxchains=8 |wi1_sstreams=8 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=QCN5024 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn+ax |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Aquantia |eth_chip2_model=AQR107 |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=5 |wan_speed=10GbE |wan_ports=1 |flags=DBDC, DFS, SFP+, SD Card slot, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac+ax |oui= }}
:• '''1148''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4800''' Mbps - 8SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ax 802.11ax] (80MHz chan.) = '''''AX6000'' class'''
{{TagLine|8×8 11ax MU-MIMO Dual Band Dual Concurrent Embedded Board}} :[https://compex.com.sg/shop/embedded-board/802-11ax/hk01-2/ Product page] (HK01.2) *8×8 11ax MU-MIMO Dual Band Dual Concurrent Embedded Board :''[[Qualcomm]] IPQ8074 802.11ax Reference Design (YC496AP.HK01)'' *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] [https://www.qualcomm.com/products/ipq8074 IPQ8074] @2.2GHz Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A53) :Flash: 32MB (NOR)/256MB (QPIC NAND)/8GB (eMMC NAND) :RAM: 2x 4Gb (1GB) - 2x ''Micron'' (DDR3L) System Memory *LAN: 1x 10Gbps Ethernet port, WAN/LAN: 5x 1GbE ports *2x Mini PCIe slots, 2x USB 3.0 ports, 1x SFP+ (10GbE) port *WLAN: Transmit power (per chain): 23dBm (2.4GHz)/20dBm (5GHz) :4×4 On-board 2.4GHz radio, up to 1148Mbps physical data rate :8×8 On-board 5GHz radio, up to 4.8Gbps physical data rate :Supports Dynamic Frequency Selection (DFS) ===Models=== :;[[Compex]] • [https://compex.com.sg/embedded-board/ Wireless embedded board] *[[Compex AP-DK03]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4028 *[[Compex AP148]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 *[[Compex CP01]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6018 *[[Compex CP03]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ6000 *[[Compex HK01]](.1) • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8074 *[[Compex HK01.2]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8074A *[[Compex WPQ872]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A *[[Compex WPQ873]] • [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8072A ==Images== :[https://compex.com.sg/shop/embedded-board/hk01/ PCB image on '''Compex'''] File:Compex HK01 IPQ8074.jpg|PCB top [[Has images::internal| ]] __NOTOC__
